"""
        """
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
f = plt.figure()
ax = f.add_subplot(111)
for inp in self.settings['flow_inlets']:
    if self.settings['wp'] is not None:
        ax.plot(self.Kr_values['sat'][inp], self.Kr_values['relperm_wp'][
            inp], 'o-', label='Krwp' + inp)
    ax.plot(self.Kr_values['sat'][inp], self.Kr_values['relperm_nwp'][inp],
        '*-', label='Krnwp' + inp)
ax.set_xlabel('Snw')
ax.set_ylabel('Kr')
ax.set_title('Relative Permability Curves')
ax.legend()
return f
